title: Paw City
description: With life in “paws” during the pandemic, aspiring dog owners need a one tap app to find the right pet-related resources.

title: Weather App
description: Simple weather application, where user inputs a city, and receives current weather data with the temperature, humidity, wind speed, and UV index

title: Note Taker
description: Note-taking app that allows a user to write, save, and delete notes, to keep track of thoughts and tasks that need to be completed.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Online/offline budget tracking app allows user to input budget data in offline settings.

title: Google Book Search
description: React-based Google books search app allows user to search books from a database, and save or delete favorited titles.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Fitness tracking app to track exercise activity.
